result.execSummary:
The defendant Shawn Walter Davis was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: to Court from Shawn W Davis regarding payment plan for fees/fines
MARQUETTE COUNTY DNA PROOF OF SUBMISSION

Defendant Shawn Walter Davis in court.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Hendee did meet with the defendant and an offer was provided.    Atty Hendee states plea agreement.  Court questions the defendant.  Defendant would like to proceed with the offer.    Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.    Defendant waives their right to an attorney.    Court finds waiver of Attorney made knowingly, voluntarily & Intelligently.
Defendant enters a No Contest plea.
  Court questions defendant regarding plea. Advises of Constitutional Rights and elements of the charge.  Court finds plea made knowingly, voluntarily & Intelligently.
  Court relies on the criminal complaint for a factual basis.

  BY THE COURT:  Court finds a sufficient factual basis to support the charges.  Court accepts defendant's plea and finds defendant guilty.

BY THE COURT:  Pay fine and costs = $379.00
  DNA Sample + $200.00 Surcharge
  Defendant agrees to the $15.00 payment plan fee.
Payment Plan:  $50.00/month commencing in August

Pre-trial conference on May 24, 2016 at 09:15 am.
Return date on June 16, 2016 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Shawn Walter Davis in court.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
16TR389 tracking:
  Atty Hendee states that bond needs to be set along with booking.
  Defendant received a copy of the criminal complaint & waives it's reading.   Court confirms address.  Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.  Defendant understands. Court finds probable cause to support the charges.

  BY THE COURT:  Court enters a Not Guilty plea on behalf of the defendant.

  Atty Hendee has no objection to a signature bond with conditions.
  BY THE COURT:  Court sets a $500 Signature bond with conditions:
*Appear for booking today

Court questions the defendant.    Defendant waives their right to an attorney in order to have a conference with the District Attorney.    Court finds waiver made knowingly, voluntarily & Intelligently.
BY THE COURT:  Set for Return and pre-trial  Return date scheduled for June 16, 2016 at 03:30 pm.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 24, 2016 at 09:15 am.
